snippet.title: Vertigo 2 - Official PlayStation VR2 Announce Trailer | Perp Games VR Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Join the developer of Vertigo 2 to learn more about this single-player FPS game, including a look at its alien world and creatures, gameplay, and updates coming to the game, like a level editor and three new alternate playable characters with unique abilities. Vertigo 2 is coming to PlayStation VR2 later in 2023, and the game is available now on SteamVR.
